alex: Have you seen the latest viral TikTok trend?
cz_reply: Ano, viděl jsem ten nejnovější virální TikTok trend.
accepted_answers: Yes, I have seen the latest viral TikTok trend.
I have watched the newest viral TikTok trend.

alex: People have been obsessed with short videos recently.
cz_reply: Lidé byli posedlí krátkými videi v poslední době.
accepted_answers: People have been obsessed with short videos recently.
Everyone has loved short videos lately.

alex: Have you posted any reels on Instagram this week?
cz_reply: Ne, tento týden jsem nepřidal žádné reels.
accepted_answers: No, I haven't posted any reels this week.
Yes, I have posted some reels on Instagram this week.

alex: I have noticed that reels get more views than normal posts.
cz_reply: Všiml jsem si, že reels dostávají více zhlédnutí než běžné příspěvky.
accepted_answers: I have noticed that reels get more views than normal posts.
Reels have gotten more views than regular posts.

alex: Have you ever gone viral on any platform?
cz_reply: Ne, nikdy jsem nebyl virální na žádné platformě.
accepted_answers: No, I haven't gone viral on any platform.
Yes, I have gone viral once.

alex: Do you think social media have changed how we communicate?
cz_reply: Ano, sociální sítě změnily způsob, jak komunikujeme.
accepted_answers: Yes, social media have changed how we communicate.
No, social media haven't changed communication that much.

alex: I have used memes to express my mood more than once.
cz_reply: Použil jsem memy k vyjádření nálady více než jednou.
accepted_answers: I have used memes to express my mood more than once.
Yes, I have used memes to show how I feel.

alex: Have you ever unfollowed someone because of their posts?
cz_reply: Ano, přestal jsem sledovat někoho kvůli jeho příspěvkům.
accepted_answers: Yes, I have unfollowed someone because of their posts.
No, I haven't unfollowed anyone for that reason.

alex: I've noticed that influencers have become very powerful recently.
cz_reply: Všiml jsem si, že influenceři se v poslední době stali velmi mocnými.
accepted_answers: I've noticed that influencers have become very powerful recently.
Yes, influencers have gained a lot of influence.

alex: Have you bought anything because an influencer recommended it?
cz_reply: Ne, nekoupil jsem nic, protože to doporučil influencer.
accepted_answers: No, I haven't bought anything because an influencer recommended it.
Yes, I have purchased something after an influencer's recommendation.

alex: Social media algorithms have changed how we discover content.
cz_reply: Algoritmy sociálních sítí změnily způsob, jak objevujeme obsah.
accepted_answers: Social media algorithms have changed how we discover content.
Yes, algorithms have transformed content discovery.

alex: Have you ever deleted a social media app to take a break?
cz_reply: Ano, smazal jsem aplikaci sociálních sítí, abych si udělal pauzu.
accepted_answers: Yes, I have deleted a social media app to take a break.
No, I haven't deleted any social media apps.

alex: I have seen people become addicted to scrolling through feeds.
cz_reply: Viděl jsem lidi, jak se stali závislými na procházení feed-ů.
accepted_answers: I have seen people become addicted to scrolling through feeds.
Yes, many people have developed scrolling addictions.

alex: Have you ever regretted posting something online?
cz_reply: Ano, litoval jsem toho, že jsem něco zveřejnil online.
accepted_answers: Yes, I have regretted posting something online.
No, I haven't regretted any of my posts.

alex: Privacy concerns have grown significantly in recent years.
cz_reply: Obavy o soukromí významně vzrostly v posledních letech.
accepted_answers: Privacy concerns have grown significantly in recent years.
Yes, people have become more worried about privacy.

alex: Have you ever changed your privacy settings after hearing about data breaches?
cz_reply: Ano, změnil jsem nastavení soukromí poté, co jsem slyšel o únicích dat.
accepted_answers: Yes, I have changed my privacy settings after hearing about data breaches.
No, I haven't changed my privacy settings for that reason.

alex: I've watched countless YouTube tutorials to learn new skills.
cz_reply: Sledoval jsem nespočet YouTube tutoriálů, abych se naučil nové dovednosti.
accepted_answers: I've watched countless YouTube tutorials to learn new skills.
Yes, I have learned many things from YouTube videos.

alex: Have you ever started a hobby because you saw it on social media?
cz_reply: Ano, začal jsem s koníčkem, protože jsem ho viděl na sociálních sítích.
accepted_answers: Yes, I have started a hobby because I saw it on social media.
No, I haven't picked up hobbies from social media.

alex: Online communities have helped many people find their tribes.
cz_reply: Online komunity pomohly mnoha lidem najít své kmeny.
accepted_answers: Online communities have helped many people find their tribes.
Yes, people have found their communities online.

alex: Have you ever made real friends through social media?
cz_reply: Ano, našel jsem skutečné přátele prostřednictvím sociálních sítí.
accepted_answers: Yes, I have made real friends through social media.
No, I haven't made genuine friendships online.

alex: I have noticed that people share more personal information than before.
cz_reply: Všiml jsem si, že lidé sdílejí více osobních informací než dříve.
accepted_answers: I have noticed that people share more personal information than before.
Yes, people have become more open about their personal lives.
